seg.source: 里德：希拉里若当选总统将提名加兰德进入最高法院
seg.translation: Reid: Hilary would pick Garland as nominee for the Supreme Court if she was elected president
Reid: Hillarijo elected president will nominate Garland to the Supreme Court
Reid: Hillary Clinton, if elected president, would nominate Garland to the Supreme Court

seg.source: 参议院民主党领袖哈里·里德 (Harry Reid) 说，他确信若民主党总统候选人希拉里·克林顿(Hillary Clinton) 当选总统，她将提名加兰德 (Merrick Garland) 法官进入最高法院。
seg.translation: Harry Reid, the Democratic Party leader in the United States Senate, said that he believes that if the Democratic Party presidential candidate Hillary Clinton becomes the President, she will nominate Merrich Garland to the Supreme Court.

Harry Reid, the Senate Democratic leader, said he was convinced that if Hillary Clinton, the Democratic presidential candidate, was elected president, she would nominate Garland (Merrick Garland) to the Supreme Court.
Senate Democratic Leader Harry Reid said he is confident that if Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton is elected president, she will nominate Judge Merrick Garland to the Supreme Court.

seg.source: 参议院共和党人自巴拉克·奥巴马 (Barack Obama) 总统三月份提名加兰德以来，一直阻止对加兰德进行确认。
seg.translation: Since Barack Obama nominated Garland, Republican senators have constantly refused to ratify Garland’s nomination.
Senate Republicans have blocked confirmation of Garland since President Barack Obama nominated Garland in March.
Senate Republicans have blocked the confirmation of Garland since President Barack Obama nominated him in March.

seg.source: 参议院多数党领袖米奇·麦康奈尔 (Mitch McConnell) 表示，下届总统将选择此人来接替已故最高法院法官斯卡利亚 (Antonin Scalia)。
seg.translation: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell expressed that the next President will select this person to replace Antonin Scalia, the late Justice of the Supreme Court.
Senate Majority Leader McConnell Mitch McConnell said the next president will choose this person to replace the late Supreme Court Judge Scalia (Antonin Scalia).
Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said the next president would choose him to replace the late Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia.

seg.source: 里德在周四的一次电话会议上说，他预测希拉里会选择“有一些可信度”的加兰德。
seg.translation: Reed said, during a teleconference on Thursday, that he expects Hillary to select Garand, which is “somewhat reliable”.
Reid said in a conference call in Thursday that he predicted Hillary would choose "some credibility" garland.
Reid said on a conference call Thursday that he predicted Hillary would pick Garland who "has some credibility."

seg.source: 里德的一位女发言人随后说，里德没有就是否会提名加兰德直接与希拉里对话，并说他只是猜测。
seg.translation: A spokeswoman for Reid said subsequently that Reid did not speak to Hilary directly about whether she would nominate Garland, and said that he was just guessing.
A spokeswoman for Reed said later that Reed did not talk directly to Hillary about whether he would nominate Garland and said he was just guessing.
A spokeswoman for Reid later said Reid had not spoken directly to Hillary about whether she would nominate Garland, and said he was only guessing.

seg.source: 他对加兰德大加赞赏，并说希拉里的团队不希望因新人选而“搅局”。
seg.translation: He praised Garland profusely, and said that Hillary’s team did not wish to “make a mess” because of the new candidate.
He praised Rand and said Hillary's team did not want to "disrupt" the new candidate.
He heaped praise on Garland and said Hillary's team didn't want to be "spoiled" by the new pick.

seg.source: 加兰德是美国哥伦比亚特区联邦巡回上诉法院的首席法官。
seg.translation: Garland is the Chief United States Circuit Judge of the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit.
Garland is the chief judge of the United States Columbia, Dist. OF Federal Circuit appeals court.
Garland is the chief justice of the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in the District of Columbia.

seg.source: 里德说，阻止加兰德提名的共和党人是共和党总统候选人唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 的“宠臣”与“成就者”。
seg.translation: Reid said that Republicans blocking Garland’s nomination are Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump’s “minions” and “enablers”.
Mr. Reid said the Republicans who blocked the nomination of Garland were the "doting" and "achievers" of the Republican presidential candidate, Donald Trump.
The Republicans who blocked Garland's nomination are "favorites" and "achievers" of Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump, Reid said.

seg.source: 他说特朗普不适合当总统。
seg.translation: He said Trump is not President-type.
He said that Trump was not fit to be president.
He said Trump was unfit to be president.
